p:
The medication was administered for 15 days of treatment with corticoid eye drops (1% prednisolone acetate) and sodium diclofenac sodium eye drops. Antibiotic eye drops (ciprofloxacin 0.3%) were also used, because it is common for epidemic conjunctivitis of viral cause, to complicate with a bacterial infection
12 . For the relief of symptoms in group C, artificial tears were used.
